# Phillip Edward Chappell

| predecessor         = James M. Seibert
| preceding           = Elijah Gates
| alma_mater          = University of Missouri (1857–1859)
}}
Phillip Edward Chappell (August 18, 1837 – February 23, 1908) was an American politician. He served as the State Treasurer of Missouri from 1881 to 1885. He attended the University of Missouri from 1857–1859.
